scripts.migrations:add: dotnet ef migrations add -p src/Infrastructure -s src/Application -o Persistence/Migrations
scripts.migrations:remove: dotnet ef migrations remove -p src/Infrastructure -s src/Application
scripts.migrations:list: dotnet ef migrations list -p src/Infrastructure -s src/Application
scripts.db:update: dotnet ef database update -p src/Infrastructure -s src/Application
scripts.db:drop: dotnet ef database drop -p src/Infrastructure -s src/Application
